description:
Zeno gets caught up in the investigation of a missing child, but Brian worries that Zeno may end up going too far due to his troubled past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Naguritai Toki ni Omae wa Itsumo Inai
Tu n’es jamais là quand je veux me défouler
You`re Always Not There When I Want to Hit You
殴りたい時におまえはいつもいない
